description: Locally defined Gofannon tools manifest for AgentLabUI, generated from available tools. Now with setup parameters.

tools.name: get_article
tools.description: Get a specific article from arXiv

tools.name: search
tools.description: Search for articles on arXiv

tools.name: addition
tools.description: Calculate the sum of two numbers

tools.name: division
tools.description: Calculate the quotient of two numbers

tools.name: exponents
tools.description: Calculate the result of a number raised to a power

tools.name: multiplication
tools.description: Calculate the product of two numbers

tools.name: subtraction
tools.description: Calculate the difference between two numbers

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: List the contents of a directory recursively in a tree-like format

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read the contents of a specified file.

tools.name: write_file
tools.description: Write the contents of a sting to a specified file.

tools.name: get_url_content
tools.description: Fetches the text content of a given URL. This tool makes a simple GET request and returns the raw text content. It does not render JavaScript or handle complex interactions.

tools.name: grants_query
tools.description: Search for EU grant funding opportunities

tools.name: clone_github_repo
tools.description: Clone a GitHub repository to a specified local directory.

tools.name: commit_file
tools.description: Commit a file to a GitHub repository

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: GitHub API Key
setup_parameters.description: GitHub Personal Access Token with 'repo' scope.

tools.name: commit_files
tools.description: Commit multiple files to a GitHub repository

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: GitHub API Key
setup_parameters.description: GitHub Personal Access Token with 'repo' scope.

setup_parameters.name: git_user_name
setup_parameters.label: Git User Name
setup_parameters.description: Your Git committer name (e.g., 'Your Name'). This will appear in the commit history.

setup_parameters.name: git_user_email
setup_parameters.label: Git User Email
setup_parameters.description: Your Git committer email (e.g., 'you@example.com'). This will appear in the commit history.

tools.name: create_issue
tools.description: Create an issue in a GitHub repository

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: GitHub API Key
setup_parameters.description: GitHub Personal Access Token with 'repo' scope.

tools.name: get_repo_contents
tools.description: Get contents of repo on github

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: GitHub API Key
setup_parameters.description: Your personal GitHub API token. Required for private repositories or higher rate limits.

tools.name: list_issues
tools.description: List all issues in a GitHub repository

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: GitHub API Key
setup_parameters.description: GitHub Personal Access Token with 'repo' scope.

tools.name: list_repo_files
tools.description: Recursively list all file paths in a given repository and branch.

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: GitHub API Key
setup_parameters.description: GitHub Personal Access Token with 'repo' scope.

tools.name: pr_review_tool
tools.description: Perform an automated pull request review using gofannon tools. It aggregates configurable checks (e.g. code quality and schema validation).

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: OpenAI API Key (for review checks)
setup_parameters.description: OpenAI API key used by some review checks. Ensure GITHUB_TOKEN is also set in function environment for GitHub API access.

setup_parameters.name: base_url
setup_parameters.label: OpenAI Base URL (Optional)
setup_parameters.description: Optional. Custom base URL for OpenAI-compatible API.

setup_parameters.name: model_name
setup_parameters.label: OpenAI Model Name (Optional)
setup_parameters.description: Optional. Model to use for OpenAI checks (e.g., gpt-4, gpt-3.5-turbo).

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Fetches and returns the content of a specific file from a GitHub repository.

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: GitHub API Key
setup_parameters.description: GitHub Personal Access Token with 'repo' scope.

tools.name: read_issue
tools.description: Read an issue and its comments from a GitHub repository

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: GitHub API Key
setup_parameters.description: GitHub Personal Access Token with 'repo' scope.

tools.name: search_repos
tools.description: Search for GitHub repositories

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: GitHub API Key
setup_parameters.description: Your personal GitHub API token with 'repo' scope for full functionality, or public access for public repos.

tools.name: google_search
tools.description: Searches Google for the given query and returns snippets from the results.

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: Google Custom Search API Key
setup_parameters.description: API Key for Google Custom Search JSON API.

setup_parameters.name: engine_id
setup_parameters.label: Google Custom Search Engine ID (CX)
setup_parameters.description: The ID of your Programmable Search Engine.

tools.name: headless_browser_get
tools.description: Retrieve the contents of a web page with JavaScript rendered using a headless browser.

tools.name: apod
tools.description: Get the Astronomy Picture of the Day from NASA

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: NASA APOD API Key
setup_parameters.description: Your API key from api.nasa.gov. 'DEMO_KEY' can be used for limited testing.

tools.name: complaints_by_vehicle
tools.description: Get complaints by vehicle make, model, and year

tools.name: iss_locator
tools.description: Returns the latitude / longitude of the current location of the International Space Station (ISS)

tools.name: pdf_reader
tools.description: Read teh text content from a PDF file

tools.name: hierarchical_cot
tools.description: Hierarchical Chain-of-Thought reasoning with outline generation and section expansion

setup_parameters.name: depth_chart
setup_parameters.label: Depth Chart Configuration
setup_parameters.description: JSON string defining the hierarchical model configuration. Example: [{"model_name": "Qwen/Qwen2.5-72B-Instruct", "base_url": "https://api.deepinfra.com/v1/openai", "api_key": "YOUR_KEY", "temperature": 0.3, "prompt_appendix": "\n\nThinks carefully."}]

tools.name: sequential_cot
tools.description: Generate a series of steps required to solve a problem using Chain-of-Thought reasoning.

setup_parameters.name: depth_chart
setup_parameters.label: Depth Chart Configuration
setup_parameters.description: JSON string defining the hierarchical model configuration. Example: [{"model_name": "Qwen/Qwen2.5-72B-Instruct", "base_url": "https://api.deepinfra.com/v1/openai", "api_key": "YOUR_KEY", "temperature": 0.3, "prompt_appendix": "\n\nThinks carefully."}]

tools.name: tree_of_thought
tools.description: Tree-of-Thought reasoning with parallel exploration of multiple paths

setup_parameters.name: depth_chart
setup_parameters.label: Depth Chart Configuration
setup_parameters.description: JSON string defining the hierarchical model configuration. Example: [{"model_name": "Qwen/Qwen2.5-72B-Instruct", "base_url": "https://api.deepinfra.com/v1/openai", "api_key": "YOUR_KEY", "temperature": 0.3, "prompt_appendix": "\n\nThinks carefully."}]

tools.name: get_opportunity
tools.description: Retrieve the full details of a specific grant opportunity, including attachments, using its unique identifier.

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Key
setup_parameters.description: Your API key for Simpler Grants.gov.

setup_parameters.name: base_url
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Base URL
setup_parameters.description: API base URL (e.g., https://api.simpler.grants.gov). Optional, defaults to SIMPLER_GRANTS_BASE_URL env var or https://api.simpler.grants.gov.

tools.name: list_agencies
tools.description: Retrieve a paginated list of agencies, optionally filtered by agency ID or active status.

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Key
setup_parameters.description: Your API key for Simpler Grants.gov.

setup_parameters.name: base_url
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Base URL
setup_parameters.description: API base URL (e.g., https://api.simpler.grants.gov). Optional, defaults to SIMPLER_GRANTS_BASE_URL env var or https://api.simpler.grants.gov.

tools.name: query_opportunities_by_applicant_eligibility
tools.description: Search for grant opportunities by applicant types and/or cost-sharing requirements.  Control the pagination of results. If not provided, defaults will be used by the API (typically page 1, a small number of items, and sorted by relevance or ID). Filter results by opportunity status. By default, only 'posted' opportunities are shown. Set other flags to True to include them. Returns a JSON string of matching opportunities.

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Key
setup_parameters.description: Your API key for Simpler Grants.gov.

setup_parameters.name: base_url
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Base URL
setup_parameters.description: API base URL (e.g., https://api.simpler.grants.gov). Optional, defaults to SIMPLER_GRANTS_BASE_URL env var or https://api.simpler.grants.gov.

tools.name: query_opportunities_by_assistance_listing
tools.description: Search for grant opportunities by one or more Assistance Listing Numbers.  Control the pagination of results. If not provided, defaults will be used by the API (typically page 1, a small number of items, and sorted by relevance or ID). Filter results by opportunity status. By default, only 'posted' opportunities are shown. Set other flags to True to include them. Returns a JSON string of matching opportunities.

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Key
setup_parameters.description: Your API key for Simpler Grants.gov.

setup_parameters.name: base_url
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Base URL
setup_parameters.description: API base URL (e.g., https://api.simpler.grants.gov). Optional, defaults to SIMPLER_GRANTS_BASE_URL env var or https://api.simpler.grants.gov.

tools.name: query_opportunities_by_award_criteria
tools.description: Search for grant opportunities by award criteria (floor, ceiling, number of awards, total funding). At least one award criterion must be specified.  Control the pagination of results. If not provided, defaults will be used by the API (typically page 1, a small number of items, and sorted by relevance or ID). Filter results by opportunity status. By default, only 'posted' opportunities are shown. Set other flags to True to include them. Returns a JSON string of matching opportunities.

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Key
setup_parameters.description: Your API key for Simpler Grants.gov.

setup_parameters.name: base_url
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Base URL
setup_parameters.description: API base URL (e.g., https://api.simpler.grants.gov). Optional, defaults to SIMPLER_GRANTS_BASE_URL env var or https://api.simpler.grants.gov.

tools.name: query_opportunities_by_dates
tools.description: Search for grant opportunities by post and/or close date ranges. At least one date parameter must be specified. Dates must be YYYY-MM-DD.  Control the pagination of results. If not provided, defaults will be used by the API (typically page 1, a small number of items, and sorted by relevance or ID). Filter results by opportunity status. By default, only 'posted' opportunities are shown. Set other flags to True to include them. Returns a JSON string of matching opportunities.

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Key
setup_parameters.description: Your API key for Simpler Grants.gov.

setup_parameters.name: base_url
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Base URL
setup_parameters.description: API base URL (e.g., https://api.simpler.grants.gov). Optional, defaults to SIMPLER_GRANTS_BASE_URL env var or https://api.simpler.grants.gov.

tools.name: query_opportunities_by_funding_details
tools.description: Search for grant opportunities by funding instruments and/or categories. At least one of 'funding_instruments' or 'funding_categories' must be provided.  Control the pagination of results. If not provided, defaults will be used by the API (typically page 1, a small number of items, and sorted by relevance or ID). Filter results by opportunity status. By default, only 'posted' opportunities are shown. Set other flags to True to include them. Returns a JSON string of matching opportunities.

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Key
setup_parameters.description: Your API key for Simpler Grants.gov.

setup_parameters.name: base_url
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Base URL
setup_parameters.description: API base URL (e.g., https://api.simpler.grants.gov). Optional, defaults to SIMPLER_GRANTS_BASE_URL env var or https://api.simpler.grants.gov.

tools.name: query_opportunities_by_multiple_criteria
tools.description: Search grant opportunities by combining various filters like agency, funding types, applicant types, etc. Useful for complex queries. At least one filter criterion or query_text should be provided.  Control the pagination of results. If not provided, defaults will be used by the API (typically page 1, a small number of items, and sorted by relevance or ID). Filter results by opportunity status. By default, only 'posted' opportunities are shown. Set other flags to True to include them. Returns a JSON string of matching opportunities.

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Key
setup_parameters.description: Your API key for Simpler Grants.gov.

setup_parameters.name: base_url
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Base URL
setup_parameters.description: API base URL (e.g., https://api.simpler.grants.gov). Optional, defaults to SIMPLER_GRANTS_BASE_URL env var or https://api.simpler.grants.gov.

tools.name: query_opportunities
tools.description: Search for grant opportunities using a text query.  Control the pagination of results. If not provided, defaults will be used by the API (typically page 1, a small number of items, and sorted by relevance or ID). Filter results by opportunity status. By default, only 'posted' opportunities are shown. Set other flags to True to include them. Returns a JSON string of matching opportunities.

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Key
setup_parameters.description: Your API key for Simpler Grants.gov.

setup_parameters.name: base_url
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Base URL
setup_parameters.description: API base URL (e.g., https://api.simpler.grants.gov). Optional, defaults to SIMPLER_GRANTS_BASE_URL env var or https://api.simpler.grants.gov.

tools.name: query_opportunities_by_agency
tools.description: Search for grant opportunities filtered by one or more agency codes. An optional text query can further refine results.  Control the pagination of results. If not provided, defaults will be used by the API (typically page 1, a small number of items, and sorted by relevance or ID). Filter results by opportunity status. By default, only 'posted' opportunities are shown. Set other flags to True to include them. Returns a JSON string of matching opportunities.

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Key
setup_parameters.description: Your API key for Simpler Grants.gov.

setup_parameters.name: base_url
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Base URL
setup_parameters.description: API base URL (e.g., https://api.simpler.grants.gov). Optional, defaults to SIMPLER_GRANTS_BASE_URL env var or https://api.simpler.grants.gov.

tools.name: search_agencies
tools.description: Search for agencies using a query string and structured filters like 'has_active_opportunity' or 'is_test_agency'.

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Key
setup_parameters.description: Your API key for Simpler Grants.gov.

setup_parameters.name: base_url
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Base URL
setup_parameters.description: API base URL (e.g., https://api.simpler.grants.gov). Optional, defaults to SIMPLER_GRANTS_BASE_URL env var or https://api.simpler.grants.gov.

tools.name: search_opportunities
tools.description: Search for grant opportunities based on optional criteria like query text and various filters. Returns the first page of results. Invalid filter values may be omitted.

setup_parameters.name: api_key
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Key
setup_parameters.description: Your API key for Simpler Grants.gov.

setup_parameters.name: base_url
setup_parameters.label: Simpler Grants.gov API Base URL
setup_parameters.description: API base URL (e.g., https://api.simpler.grants.gov). Optional, defaults to SIMPLER_GRANTS_BASE_URL env var or https://api.simpler.grants.gov.

tools.name: wikipedia_lookup
tools.description: Fetches a Wikipedia summary for a given search term.
